question: Which of the following organizations publishes the list of Global Systemically Important Banks (G-SIBs)?
option4: Financial Stability Board (FSB) in consultation with Basel Committee on Banking Supervision (BCBS)
answer: Financial Stability Board (FSB) in consultation with Basel Committee on Banking Supervision (BCBS)
explanation: Financial Stability Board (FSB) in consultation with Basel Committee on Banking Supervision (BCBS) publishes the Global Systemically Important Banks (G-SIBs).
